description:
gonna go ahead and put a big old TW for mentions of suicidal thoughts on this

--

hello i thought i'd

like to write a poem

that was like a game

--

move the mouse around and see what you see.

i don't write poetry typically, but i do write games. the genre says "interactive fiction" but this is autobiographical, so it's more a work of "interactive reflection", which sounds kind of pretentious but i'll take it.
